e.d: (1874-1929) Austrian writer of prose narratives, lyric poetry, and dramas. Perhaps best known as the librettist for a number of Richard Strauss's operas.
in front of; ago; before; from
the Sixth Dragoons, a cavalry regiment in which Hofmannsthal himself served, were until 1867 named for the Austrian "General of the Cavalry" Ludwig Georg Thedel, Graf von Wallmoden (1769-1862).
[in this year of political upheaval, Austria was fighting in Northern Italy to retain its possessions there]
